/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/matrix_mul.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/matrix_mul.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libmatmul_cuda.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
